name: Fly Swatter (MammaAbbe, Voiler)
description:
Fly Swatter is an arcade highscore game where you defend your precious bedroom from an unreasonable amount of flies and bumblebees flying in through you window. Whack those flies and share your highscore in the comments below!

This is a jam game made in 24 hours for the Indie Tales Game Jam 2021.

HOW TO PLAY:
A, D | 
W, Space | Jump
Mouse | Aim 
Left Mouse Button | WHACK!

Whack the flies and watch out for the unstoppable bumblebees!

Code: Abbe Sköld 
Art: Samuel Olsson
Music: Gustav Bååth

Update coming after the rating period with new enemies, improved game feel and highscore being saved between sessions!
